name: Mark Davis Pro Bass Challenge
synopsis: Mark Davis Pro Bass Challenge features various tournaments that follow the official rules, schedules, and rating system of true American Bass Fishing tournaments. You'll work your way to the top and compete against fishing master Mark Davis. The game offers an enhanced bass AI, so not only are the Black Bass faithfully reproduced on the screen , they also act just like real Black Bass. If you catch enough fish and win enough tournaments, you'll improve your ranking and unlock all the latest tackle equipment.
